name: trace
effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it copies a random opponent's ability.

This ability cannot copy flower gift, forecast, illusion, imposter, multitype, trace, wonder guard, or zen mode.
short_effect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

effect_changes.black-white: Can copy flower gift and wonder guard.
